buff_desc_2v2championbuff:
Arena Stat Adjustments
Champions gain bonus stats:{{ buff_desc_2v2ChampionBuff_Split1_@f1@ }}

Plus additional stats, based on their and their partner's combined missing health. Up to:
  • %i:scaleMS% Movement Speed: @f9@
  • %i:scaleTenacity% Tenacity and slow resist @f10@%
  • %i:scaleManaRegen% Mana Regen: @f11@ Energy Regen: +@f12@%

    Ranged champions additionally gain:{{ buff_desc_2v2ChampionBuff_Split2_@f1@ }}

    Additionally, there is no attack speed cap, and champions gain adaptive Attack Damage or Ability Power for %i:scaleCrit% Critical Strike Chance in excess of 100%. Combo Breaker: If you have been Immobilized or unable to act for 5 of the last 7 seconds you break free, becoming Unstoppable for 3s.
buff_desc_2v2championbuff_split1_0: <li><scaleHealth>%i:scaleHealth% Health: %i:meleeActive% @f2@ | %i:rangedInactive%<if0is0>@f3@</if0is0></scaleHealth><li><scaleArmor>%i:scaleArmor% Armor:%i:meleeActive% @f5@ | %i:rangedInactive%<if0is0>@f6@</if0is0></scaleArmor><li><scaleMR>%i:scaleMR% Magic Resist:%i:meleeActive% @f5@ | %i:rangedInactive%<if0is0>@f6@</if0is0></scaleMR><li><scaleMana>%i:scaleMana% Mana: @f4@</scaleMana> <rules> Energy: +@f7@%</rules>
buff_desc_2v2championbuff_split1_1: <li><scaleHealth>%i:scaleHealth% Health: %i:meleeInctive% <if0is0>@f2@</if0is0> | %i:rangedActive% @f3@</scaleHealth><li><scaleArmor>%i:scaleArmor% Armor:%i:meleeInctive% <if0is0>@f5@</if0is0> | %i:rangedActive% @f6@</scaleArmor><li><scaleMR>%i:scaleMR% Magic Resist:%i:meleeInctive% <if0is0>@f5@</if0is0> | %i:rangedActive% @f6@</scaleMR><li><scaleMana>%i:scaleMana% Mana: @f4@</scaleMana> <rules>%i:scaleMana% Energy: +@f7@%</rules>

buff_desc_philosophersstonedisplay: If minions die near you and you don't kill them you get gold and are healed.
buff_desc_practicetool_modifystats_healt: This unit has increased Maximum Health.
buff_desc_practicetool_modifystats_resis: This unit has increased Armor and Magic Resistance.
buff_desc_presstheattack_amp: <titleLeft>{{perk_displayname_PressTheAttack}}</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is receiving bonus damage from all sources.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_presstheattack_stack: <titleLeft>{{perk_displayname_PressTheAttack}}</titleLeft><mainText>At @perk.PressTheAttack:HitsRequired@ stacks, this unit will take bonus adaptive damage and become vulnerable, increasing the damage they take from all sources. </mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_pressthreeattacks_amp:
{{perk_displayname_PressThreeAttacks}}
This unit has been exposed and is taking extra damage.
Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_pressthreeattacks_stack:
{{perk_displayname_PressThreeAttacks}}
If this unit is hit 3 times it will be exposed.
Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_puppyfoodbuff:
Every @spell.PuppyControllerBuff:TreatTimer@ seconds gain a bonus treat. If fully transformed, instead every @spell.PuppyControllerBuff:LongTreatTimer@ gain a bonus treat.
Next time you kill a monster, feed your companion a treat and get @spell.PuppyControllerBuff:TreatGold@ gold!
buff_desc_qiyanawenchantedbuff: <titleLeft>Terrashape</titleLeft><mainText>Qiyana has empowered her weapon with elemental magic and deals bonus damage on hit.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_qiyanawenchantedbuffhaste: Qiyana has increased Move Speed while near her Terrashaped element.
buff_desc_queenstributedisplay: <titleLeft>Queen's Tribute</titleLeft><mainText>Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal additional damage and grant a short movespeed boost along with bonus gold. </mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_relle: <titleLeft>Attract and Repel</titleLeft><mainText>While nearby, Rell grants this ally increased Armor and Magic Resist and can use an ability to stun enemies between them.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellestun: <titleLeft>Stunned</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is stunned and unable to move.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellp_buff: <titleLeft>Break The Mold</titleLeft><mainText>Rell has stolen Armor and Magic Resist from her enemies.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellp_debuff: <titleLeft>Break The Mold</titleLeft><mainText>Rell has stolen Armor and Magic Resist from this unit.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellr: <titleLeft>Magnet Storm</titleLeft><mainText>Rell is Dragging in all nearby enemies.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellr_damage: <titleLeft>Dragged</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is slowly being dragged towards Rell (does not interrupt movement or casts).</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellr_startpull: <titleLeft>Magnet Storm</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is being pulled towards Rell.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellw_dismountedbuff: <titleLeft>Ferromancy: Armored</titleLeft><mainText>Rell gains increased Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range while armored but moves slowly.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellw_knockup: <titleLeft>Knocked Up</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is knocked up and unable to move.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellw_shield: <titleLeft>Shielded</titleLeft><mainText>When Rell transforms her mount into her heavy armor, she gains a shield that lasts until broken or she transforms back.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_rellwempoweredattack: <titleLeft>Mounted Charge</titleLeft><mainText>Rell runs faster towards enemy champions and her next attack will flip the target.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_renatapassive: Renata has marked this unit for death.
buff_desc_renektonrageready: <titleLeft>Reign of Anger</titleLeft><mainText>Renekton is furious, watch out!</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_s10_support_quest_display:
Gold Quest ProgressEarn gold with your support item to upgrade it.

Only transforms out of combat.Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_samirapassive: <titleLeft>Daredevil Impulse</titleLeft><mainText>Why are you reading this? Style on them!</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_shenpassiveshield: <titleLeft>Ki Barrier</titleLeft><mainText>Shen is blocking damage with a shield he generated by casting spells.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_smoldere: <titleLeft>{{Spell_SmolderE_Name}}</titleLeft><mainText>Fly over terrain at increased speed attacking the lowest Health enemy.</mainText>
buff_desc_sr_infernalrift_firemeepbuff: This unit has increased Ability Haste from collecting Infernal Cinders.
buff_desc_sr_infernalrift_firemeepspeedb: This unit has increased Move Speed from picking up an Infernal Cinder.
buff_desc_srchampionbuffdeathspeed:
HomeguardWhile out of combat, this unit has greatly increased Move Speed that decays over time.

(This is given to all champions who die before 20 minutes of game time have passed.)Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_srhomeguardlockout: <titleLeft>Homeguard</titleLeft><mainText>Homeguard is temporarily locked due to recent combat.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_srt_laneswapminionbonus: <titleLeft>Lane Swapped</titleLeft><mainText>This unit receives all gold and experience from nearby lane minions because their opponents are lane swapping.</mainText>
buff_desc_srt_laneswapminionpenalty: <titleLeft>Lane Swapper</titleLeft><mainText>This unit receives reduced income from lane minions because they're lane swapping.</mainText>
buff_desc_sru_eyeofthecrab: Eye of the Crab You are revealed by the Rift Scuttler's zone.Source: Rift Scuttler
buff_desc_srx_cloudzonespeedbuff:
Cloud Drake
Gaining 20% Move Speed whilst inside Cloud zones, increased to 35% while out of combat with champions.
buff_desc_srx_dragonbuffcloud: <titleLeft>Cloud Dragon</titleLeft><mainText>+@Spell.SRX_DragonBuffCloud:MSAmountPerStack*100@% Out Of Combat Move Speed and +@Spell.SRX_DragonBuffCloud:SRAmountPerStack*100@% Slow Resistance</mainText>
buff_desc_srx_dragonbuffcloududyr:
Cloud Dragon Udyr
Cooldown between stance swaps reduced by @Spell.UdyrPassiveMonkeyAgility:UdyrAHAmountPerCloudDragon*100@ Ability Haste per Cloud Dragon
buff_desc_srx_dragonbuffruined:
Ruined Dragon Buff
Attacks apply Ruined Dragon's Blight to towers, dealing @Spell.SRX_DragonBuffRuined:Damage@ of the tower's max health as magic damage once every second.
This team has dealt @f1@ this way so far!
buff_desc_srx_dragonbuffruined_debuff:
Ruined Dragon Buff
Attacks apply Ruined Dragon's Blight to towers, dealing @f1@% of the tower's max health as magic damage once every second for 2 seconds.
buff_desc_srx_dragonsoulbuffcloud_active:
Cloud Dragon Soul
Gaining non-ultimate cooldown whilst in combat.
buff_desc_srx_dragonsoulbuffcloud_moveme:
Cloud Dragon Soul
This unit has increased Move Speed.

Cloud Dragon Soul
Move Speed is on cooldown.
buff_desc_srx_dragonsoulbuffinfernal_coo:
Infernal Dragon Soul
Your Infernal Dragon Soul is on cooldown.
buff_desc_srx_dragonsoulbuffocean_hot: <titleLeft>Ocean Dragon Soul</titleLeft><mainText>Rapidly regenerating <healing>Health</healing> and <scaleMana>Mana</scaleMana> after damaging an enemy.</mainText>
buff_desc_srx_dragonsoulbuffparty_moveme:
Party Dragon Soul
This unit has increased Move Speed, Ability Power and Attack Damage
buff_desc_steraksshield: <titleLeft>Sterak's Fury</titleLeft><mainText>Increased size, tenacity, and pure rage.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_summonaeryally: <titleLeft>{{perk_displayname_SummonAery}}</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is shielded by Aery and will block some incoming damage.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_summonaeryready: <titleLeft>{{perk_displayname_SummonAery}}</titleLeft><mainText>Damage an enemy or target an ally with a spell to deploy Aery!</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_summonerdot: <titleLeft>Summoner Ignite</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is taking damage each second and is afflicted with Grievous Wounds.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_summonerexhaustdebuff: <titleLeft>Exhaust Debuff</titleLeft><mainText>This unit deals significantly less damage.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_summonerexhaustslow: <titleLeft>Exhaust Slow</titleLeft><mainText>This unit's Move Speed is slowed.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_summonerheal: <titleLeft>Heal: Speed Increase</titleLeft><mainText>This unit's Move Speed is increased.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_summonersnowball: <titleLeft>Dash</titleLeft><mainText>This unit has been recently hit by an enemy Mark and enemy team has <font color='#ee91d7'>True Sight</font> of it.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_supportquestchargedisplay: <titleLeft>Gold Quest Charges</titleLeft><mainText>Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings and executing minions grant Gold per unique spell cast.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_swainppullready:
Nevermove
Swain has brough his enemies to a kneel and can choose to drag them even further below him.Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_swainrnovaslow:
Soulburn
Swain is ten steps ahead of you, slowing your every move.Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_swainsoulcounterkey: <titleLeft>Ravenous Flock</titleLeft><mainText>Swain has collected @f1@ Soul Fragments and has gained @f2@ bonus Health.</mainText>
buff_desc_syndrapassivecapstonebuff: Syndra has achieved <spellName>Transcendence</spellName>, granting herself <scaleAP>@f1.0@ Ability Power</scaleAP>.
buff_desc_syndrapassivestacks:
Transcendent
Syndra is assimilating power and has collected @f1@ Splinters of Wrath.Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_tahmkenche: <titleLeft>Thick Skin</titleLeft><mainText>Tahm Kench stores a portion of incoming damage as Gray Health.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_targonquestdisplay:
Gold QuestEarn 500 gold with this item to transform it.

Only transforms out of combat.Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_targonquestdisplaytt:
Gold QuestEarn 750 gold with this item to transform it.

Only transforms out of combat.Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_targonslineshield: <titleLeft>Shield Battery</titleLeft><mainText>You slowly regenerate a shield when out of combat. Executing minions with Spoils of War charges the shield faster.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_threshestun: You have been flayed by Thresh.
buff_desc_trinityforce: <titleLeft>Trinity Force</titleLeft><mainText>This unit will deal bonus damage on its next Attack.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_trinityforcestacks: <titleLeft>Trinity Force</titleLeft><mainText>Gain stacking Attack Damage by attacking Champions or towers.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_tunnelvision:
{{perk_displayname_TunnelVision}}Gain infinitely stacking AD or AP, Adaptive, as you attack the same target.
Source: @SourceName@
buff_desc_twitchhideinshadowsbuff: <titleLeft>Ambush</titleLeft><mainText>Twitch has ambushed and has gained increased <attackspeed>attack speed</attackspeed></mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_udyre: <titleLeft>Stampede Stance</titleLeft><mainText>Udyr's first attack against each target leaps at them and Stuns them.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_udyre2activation: <titleLeft>Awakened Stampede Stance</titleLeft><mainText>Udyr has greatly increased Move Speed and immunity to Immobilizing and Disabling effects.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_udyrq2activation: <titleLeft>Awakened Wilding Stance</titleLeft><mainText>Udyr's Attack Speed is greatly increased and his next two attacks chain lightning to deal bonus magic damage.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_udyrractivation: <titleLeft>Wingborne Storm</titleLeft><mainText>A storm surrounds Udyr, dealing magic damage and slowing units inside.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_udyrw2activation: <titleLeft>Awakened Mantle Stance</titleLeft><mainText>Udyr is protected by a large shield and heals over time.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_upgradedsummonerteledash: <titleLeft>Rapid Teledash</titleLeft><mainText>This unit is dashing to their target location.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_vegeancedelay: <titleLeft>{{perk_displayname_VeteranAftershock}}</titleLeft><mainText>This unit has increased resists and will deal damage to nearby units.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_desc_yoneq: Yone's next stack will empower Mortal Steel.
buff_desc_zombiewarddamagebuff: <titleLeft>{{perk_displayname_ZombieWard}} bonus damage</titleLeft><mainText>Your next attack or offensive spell against an enemy Champion will deal bonus magic damage.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
buff_item3109mspd: This unit has increased Move Speed towards it's partner.
buff_jaxfishingpassivegoldfishbuff: <titleLeft>Rare Fish Get!</titleLeft><mainText>This unit caught a rare fish!</mainText>
buff_ksantewknockback: This unit is being knocked back.
buff_ofaplayerbuff_damagedealtmodified_1: This unit deals @f8@% of its normal damage.
buff_ofaplayerbuff_damagetakenmodified_1: This unit receives @f9@% of its normal damage.
buff_ofaplayerbuff_msmodified_1: This unit has @f7@% of its normal Move Speed.
buff_partyfavoraura:
Minion Party Time!Opening a party favor turned you into an infectious party animal!Ally minions around you move 0.0000001% faster.
But most importantly, they sparkle!

(Only you and your team will see how much you're illuminating the minion dance floor. It's a private VIP party!)
buff_sennaquestactive_name: Sentinels of Light don't fear the dark
buff_sennaquestactivethresh_name: Oh the eternity we shall spend together.
buff_shacofriendlybox:
Cat in the Box!You have collected Shaco Boxes! Every 10 boxes will give you a Small Party Favor
Source: @SourceName@
buff_sylasr_description: Sylas has stolen this enemy's ultimate!
buff_sylasrbuff_description: Sylas is holding onto a stolen ultimate!
buff_teemopassive_summary: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.
buff_titanic_hydra: Your next attack will cleave in a large area.
buff_vendetta: This unit has a Vendetta against them and deals decreased damage to the caster of this debuff.
buff_volibeare_shield_description: Volibear is shielded by electrical energy.
buff_volibearp_description: Volibear has increased <attackSpeed>Attack Speed</attackSpeed>. At 5 stacks his Attacks create chain lightning.
buff_volibearq_description: Volibear's next attack will deal bonus damage and stun his target.
buff_volibearr_description: Volibear has increased health and attack range, and can pass through units.
buff_volibearr_towerdisable_description: Volibear has temporarily disabled this tower.
buff_volibearw_description: Volibear's next Frenzied Maul will deal bonus damage and heal him.
buff_yoneq3ready: Yone's next Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne.
buff_yuumipvisualtracker_1: No other allies can compete with how strong Yuumi's bond with her Best Friend!
buff_yuumipvisualtracker_2: While their bond is strong, Yuumi has made a few good friendships with her other allies.
buff_yuumipvisualtracker_3: Yuumi has made so many good friends! Her Best Friend could change at any moment!
championbalancebuff_nomodifiers:
Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.

This buff is not legally binding
game_buff_damagetootip_1507: <titleLeft>Malfunction</titleLeft><titleRight></titleRight><subtitleLeft></subtitleLeft><mainText>This structure will lose an escalating percentage of its maximum health every 30 seconds.</mainText>
game_buff_shredtootip_1507: <titleLeft>Resistance Shred</titleLeft><titleRight></titleRight><subtitleLeft></subtitleLeft><mainText>This structure has lost armor and magic resist.</mainText>
game_tip_dragonbuff_name: Dragon no longer gives global gold and instead gives a stacking buff!
generatedtip_passive_kalistapassivebuff_: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
generatedtip_passive_ziggspassivebuff_de: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
hexplate_overdrive_buff: This unit has increased Attack Speed and Move Speed.
item_3053_healing_buff: <titleLeft>Sterak's Rage</titleLeft><mainText>This unit heals for each enemy champion they are in combat with.</mainText><postScriptLeft>Source: @SourceName@</postScriptLeft>
